globals.title: GetQuorum: Electronic Proxies for Condo Meetings
globals.description: Significantly increase owner representation at your condo meetings with our electronic proxy, online voting, and owner engagement platform.
globals.uvp: Reaching Quorum and Passing Bylaws Just Got Easier
